modName: Skyrim Celtic Main Menu Theme - The Song Of The Dragonborn
summary:
This mod remplace the song theme main menu with a version celtic arranged BrunuhVille and featuring Sharm

All rights reserved to them BrunuhVille thanks for composing this version and sharm for your kind and beautiful voice
they are the authors deserve all the credit I love the guys did just the contribution of this great version
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys this mis first mod  i hope you like this song remplace the main song with celtic version if you like please giveme & endorse i am so greatfull


All rights reserved to them BrunuhVille thanks for composing this version and sharm for your kind and beautiful voice
they are the authors deserve all the credit I love the guys did just the contribution of this great version



The Song of the Dragonborn is

Composed by Jeremy Soule
Arranged by BrunuhVille
Voice by Sharm


Instrucciones / Instrucciones
Instalar con nexus mod manager (español)
Install with nexus mod manager(english)

enjoy disfruta ☻
